participant_1.background:
I would prefer a house with a yard for my dog to run around in.
there s only been one set of twins in my family.
my family came from greece in the 1950s.
i have 5 grandchildren.
my mom raised me by herself and taught me to play baseball.

participant_2.background:
I do not have my own home yet.
i love agatha christie novels.
I spend my day making pottery and hiding my true self from my parents.
i still like unicorns even though i m an adult.
I'm not sure if I'll be able to balance my work and my personal life.

content.text: Hi, I'm doing pretty good. How about you?
I'm doing well. Where are you from?
I am from the United States. Where are you from?
Oh, that's cool. I've always wanted to go to Greece. What's it like there?
It's beautiful. The food is amazing and the people are friendly.
That's sounds great. I'm sure I'd love it there.
I'm glad. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, make pottery, and spend time with my family.
Oh, that sounds nice. I like to read too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read mysteries and thrillers. I love Agatha Christie novels.
Oh, I've read a few of her books. They're really good.
I know, right? I love her writing style.
I think I'm going to go make some dinner. What are you doing for the rest of the day?
I'm not sure yet. I might go for a walk or watch a movie.
Oh, that sounds like fun. Have a good day!
